name: #1 Echo
details:
Digital DelayElectro-Harmonix has a reputation for quality delays and the #1 Echo is a prime example. The tone is ultra high quality up to two seconds of maximum warm analog-sounding delay. The feedback control sets the number of repeats and how fast they fade. The blend control lets you adjust the balance of echo volume with straight through signal, putting your sound exactly in the pocket you want.
Quick Specs

True bypass
Tough and compact die-cast chassis
96DC-200BI power supply included
Current Draw: 185mA

http://www.ehx.com/products/number-1-echo
